summary: IT Manager with extensive experience in infrastructure management, project leadership, security audits, and vendor management across corporate and remote facilities.

experience.title: IT Manager
experience.description: Stabilize and manage infrastructure and applications for corporate and remote facilities; create standard hardware and software lists and purchase based on those lists; create fiscal year IT department budget; perform IT audits and propose changes; administer IT systems and applications; plan and manage IT projects; define and plan employee training programs; maintain production database applications; analyze system performance and recommend infrastructure upgrades; reduce downtime by diagnosing complex issues; negotiate vendor contracts for best price; streamline internal communications; perform vulnerability and risk assessments and security audits; implemented VOIP phone system for the organization; manage corporate website edits; determine technology needs with departments; provide end-user support to in-office and remote users.

experience.title: Senior Technical Analyst
experience.description: Led a team of help desk technicians to ensure high customer satisfaction and prompt issue resolution for over 30 clients; maintained and monitored ticket queue; determined issue escalation paths; administered IT systems and applications; analyzed system performance and recommended infrastructure upgrades; maintained client communications; owned complex client help desk and infrastructure rollouts; developed detailed technical documentation and processes; collaborated with Director of IT to develop help desk policies; made technical recommendations to clients based on need and cost; acted as account owner for select accounts; formulated monthly help desk budget; worked with team and vendors on technical training needs.

experience.title: Director of Information Technology
experience.description: Managed corporate network and ensured high system availability; developed backup and disaster recovery plan; reduced downtime by diagnosing and resolving complex technology related issues; administered MPLS network between remote locations; coordinated construction and configuration of remote offices; implemented corporate infrastructure monitoring program; managed corporate phone and voicemail systems; provide quality support to all personnel; communicate with President/CEO on all technical matters.

experience.title: Director of Information Technology
experience.description: Managed corporate network and ensured high system availability; maintained disaster recovery methods and backup procedures; administered 68 Local Area Networks; investigated and implemented a document management solution; managed internal phone switch voicemail system; oversaw IT staff and trained; implemented an incident reporting system that tracks issues and their corrections; formulated departmental policy and procedure documents; created annual IT budget and monitored IT-related expenditures; researched and recommended system development priorities; effectively communicated IT-related information to superiors; communicated with all departments to ensure IT needs are met; wrote technical documentation for hardware and software installation, end-user support documents and client PC standards; negotiated with vendors for cost-effective solutions; provided end-users with training on Microsoft Office products; reduced cell phone bills by 40% and travel expenses by 45% by implementing policy.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Provided leadership and direction to installation team members by investigating radiology department workflow, gathering requirements, managing scope and ensuring quality; worked with sales team to determine PACS, Radiology Information Systems and/or Hospital Information System needs; coordinated with vendors, hospital staff and administration to determine project timeline; aware of HIPAA guidelines and their implications throughout the project timeline; investigated Radiology modalities to determine DICOM compatibility and/or upgrade needs; participated in all aspects of equipment installations; communicated feedback to management regarding needs of the sites; developed procedures to deploy client PCs with a standard image and security policies; worked with help desk team to develop consistent help desk methods and call logging techniques.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Systems
